invalid_price_state.description: The energy price sensor's state must be numeric, otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated.
invalid_price_state.title: The energy price sensor {price_entity_id} has a non-numeric state '{price_state}'

invalid_state.description: The energy sensor's state must be numeric, otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated.
invalid_state.title: The energy sensor {energy_entity_id} has a non-numeric state '{energy_state}'

invalid_state_class.description: The energy sensor's state class must be either of 'measurement', 'increasing' or 'total_increasing', otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated.
invalid_state_class.title: The energy sensor {energy_entity_id} has an unsupported state class '{state_class}'

invalid_unit.description: The energy sensor's unit must be either of {supported_units}, otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated.
invalid_unit.title: The energy sensor {energy_entity_id} has an unsupported unit '{unit}'

no_last_reset.description: The energy price sensor with state_class 'measurement' must set 'last_reset', otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated.
no_last_reset.title: The energy sensor {energy_entity_id} has no last_reset

no_price_state.description: The energy price sensor is missing, this prevents costs for {energy_entity_id} from being calculated.
no_price_state.title: The energy price sensor {price_entity_id} is missing

no_unit.description: The energy price sensor's unit must be set, otherwise costs for {energy_entity_id} can't be calculated..
no_unit.title: The energy sensor {energy_entity_id} has no unit
